clear clipboard after automatically submitting magnet to transfer, couldn't use the feature until clipboard was cleared. Changed to SHOW_IMPLICIT to see if this solves erratic virtual keyboard behavior reported.

Added %d on linke 180

Deleted by accident previously
fixes issue where adding transfers manually would allow for repeated transfers.
transfers started on the transfer screen also get queued if not on wi-fi and data saving settings are on. refactor to avoid code repetition.

Merge pull request #64 from Paulinka/master

Updated Polish, Spanish and a bit of German Translations
Logic updates on transfer menu actions for finished torrents. if seeding is not enabled, then the 'stop' is now showing as 'clear'. if seeding is possible, instead of resume, we now show 'seed'
transfer's tab text a bit smaller. redundant strings in es/strings.xml after merge.
Resume/Seed menu action considers mobile data bittorrent preferences.
